story.text: A [[Simple Tool]] is one that solves a single problem domain very completely and consistently, can integrate painlessly with other [[Simple Tool]](s), and has a very simple user interface. Wiki itself is on its way to becoming a nice [[Simple Tool]].

A [[Simple Tool]] is one that solves a single problem domain very completely and consistently, can integrate painlessly with other [[Simple Tool]](s), and has a very simple user interface. Wiki itself is on its way to becoming a nice [[Simple Tool]].
